prompt: Design an edit profile page with a retro theme, featuring a centered rectangular profile picture with a thick polaroid-style border and a camera icon at the bottom center. Include input fields for full name, email, phone number, and bio, each with a typewriter font and beige background. Use green accents for buttons and borders, with a cream-colored page background. Arrange the layout in a scrollable column with moderate spacing. The save button should have a bold, retro green design. Include an app bar with a retro font title and green background.
